snippet.title: Pit Rush Game Play (0.0.1.0)
snippet.description:
Pit Rush is a couch Co-Op action game for PC that supports up to four players.

Are you tired of the harsh Slam life? 
Do you want Riches and Fame? 
Do you want an apartment at the top of the city where the sun still shines and the wind blows? 
Then join the show today. 
Enter the tower of PitRush, conquer its arenas and make your dreams come true.

Play our game: https://the-tribe.itch.io/pitrush
Visit our Studio: https://the-tribe.itch.io/

Find us on Social:
Join un on Discord: https://discord.gg/XrTeH3D
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pit_rush/
Befriend us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Pitrush-102840008181729
